name: Trexo Robotics
headline: Exoskeletons to help people walk, starting with children
description: Trexo Robotics is building exoskeletons to help people walk, starting with children with Cerebral Palsy. Our product allows children with disabilities like Cerebral Palsy, to walk, in many cases for the first time in their lives. Trexo was started when Manmeet found that his nephew was born with Cerebral Palsy and would never be able to walk. They are already commercial with customers all over US and Canada. Their vision is to replace the wheelchair, for children, adults, and the elderly.

# Reimagine Your Child’s Future One Step At A Time
**Trexo Home is a robotic gait training device kiddos use at home, to improve gait pattern as well as increase strength and endurance**
**[Learn more about the Trexo Home](http://trexorobotics.com/<https:/www.trexorobotics.com/trexo-home>)**
# Reimagine Your Child’s Future One Step At A Time
Trexo Robotics Exoskeleton helps children with disabilities walk at home or in your neighborhood!**[Learn more about the Trexo Home](http://trexorobotics.com/<https:/www.trexorobotics.com/trexo-home>)**
[Reserve Now](http://trexorobotics.com/<https:/www.trexorobotics.com/reserve-your-trexo-home/>)
## Visit Us in Mississauga For An In-Office Trial
**If you want your kiddo to trial the Trexo, you don’t have to wait for an event.** **Click the button to connect with us and we will schedule it as soon as possible.**
Please note at this time U.S. families are not able to trial the Trexo and international families are welcome to if you visit us in Canada. At this time we aren’t not offering trials internationally.
[Request A Trial](http://trexorobotics.com/<https:/www.trexorobotics.com/request-a-trial/>)
Every Step Counts! Congratulations to all of the kiddos that worked hard to reach this incredible milestone of 100,000,000+ Collective Steps. We will continue to watch their steps increase as a way to celebrate their determination and effort.
Steps Counter
Error fetching data
Steps Update Every Minute
## **Give your child a chance to thrive**
Your child’s disability should not define what they’re capable of. The Trexo Brace gets your child upright and walking so they can keep their whole body active!
## **Give your child a chance to thrive**
Your child’s disability should not define what they’re capable of. The Trexo Robotic Gait Trainer helps with ambulation for children with mobility challenges.
Trexo’s adjustability makes it a versatile brace to help most children with a disability experience over-the-ground walking.
Children with the following conditions may be able to use the Trexo:
  * Cerebral Palsy (GMFCS III-V)
  * Spinal Muscular Atrophy (SMA)
  * Muscular Dystrophy
  * Stroke
  * Brain injury
  * Hemi and Paraplegia
  * Spinal cord injury
  * Rett syndrome
  * Neuromuscular conditions
  * And others – check with us if you aren’t sure


![Trexo Robotic Gait Trainer](https://www.trexorobotics.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Border-cover-whats-new-at-Trexo.png)
![Trexo and treadmill user](https://www.trexorobotics.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Treadmill-Julian-1.jpg)
**Trexo gives children with mobility challenges the opportunity to get much needed exercise and movement, to support their overall health and wellness.**
## Our Products
## Trexo Home
Set up for your child’s unique needs to use at home
  * Ongoing video technical support
  * Basic training on the system
  * Accessories for the user’s needs
  * 14-day refund guarantee


[Learn More](http://trexorobotics.com/<https:/www.trexorobotics.com/trexo-home>)
## Trexo Plus
A physical therapist’s companion to provide gait training services in a clinic or a hospital
  * Ongoing video technical support 
  * PT training on the system
  * Full range of Accessories
  * 30-day refund guarantee


[Learn More](http://trexorobotics.com/<https:/www.trexorobotics.com/trexo-plus>)
## Trexo Home
Set up for your child’s unique needs to use at home whenever the desire to walk strikes
  * Ongoing video technical support
  * Basic training on the system
  * Accessories for the user’s needs
  * 14-day refund guarantee


[Learn More](http://trexorobotics.com/<https:/www.trexorobotics.com/trexo-home>)
## Trexo Plus
A physical therapist’s companion to provide gait training services in a clinic or a hospital
  * Ongoing video technical support
  * PT training on the system
  * Full range of Accessories
  * 30-day refund guarantee


[Learn More](http://trexorobotics.com/<https:/www.trexorobotics.com/trexo-plus>)
## Success Stories
[![](https://www.trexorobotics.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/Savvy-blog-post-square-img.jpg)](http://trexorobotics.com/<https:/www.trexorobotics.com/build-strength-for-weight-bearing/>)
#### [Savvy's progress with the Trexo](http://trexorobotics.com/<https:/www.trexorobotics.com/build-strength-for-weight-bearing/>)
Read on how four year old Savvy gained more independence, strength, and is now able to weight bear fully while using the Trexo.
[![](https://www.trexorobotics.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/Iris-blog-post-square-img.jpg)](http://trexorobotics.com/<https:/www.trexorobotics.com/iris-before-and-after-trexo-home/>)
#### [Iris' progress with the Trexo](http://trexorobotics.com/<https:/www.trexorobotics.com/iris-before-and-after-trexo-home/>)
Read on how Iris learned gait patterning, built leg & core strength, and improved her hip flexion with 5 months of using the Trexo Brace.
[![](https://www.trexorobotics.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/Luz-blog-post-square-img.jpg)](http://trexorobotics.com/<https:/www.trexorobotics.com/trexo-benefits-for-luz/>)
#### [Luz's progress with the Trexo](http://trexorobotics.com/<https:/www.trexorobotics.com/trexo-benefits-for-luz/>)
Read on how Luz worked on her head and core control, progressed to oral feeding, and developed more self awareness and confidence with regular Trexo use.
[See all Trexo success stories](http://trexorobotics.com/<https:/www.trexorobotics.com/category/kids-stories/>)
Parental feedback and success stories are not intended for US audiences. Currently Trexo is not available in the U.S.
## What parents have to say
“I’m so grateful for it, check everybody’s hips! Every child who’s not ambulatory should be given a chance to be in a Trexo and walk around!”
Alex's mom, Lauren
“Trexo is giving us hope because as a parent you are told all of these things your child will never do. Trexo has changed that.”
Luz's mom, Caro
“Friday is our 2 year anniversary! Trexo is working out great! Savvy loves it and we switched to the endurance mode and she is doing great on her own. We are so happy!”
Savvy's mom, Christina
[See more Trexo Testimonials](http://trexorobotics.com/<https:/www.trexorobotics.com/trexo-testimonials/>)
## Not sure if the Trexo will be right for your child?
We conduct an in-depth assessment of each child to ensure they are a good candidate for the Trexo Brace. Before talking to one of our experts, you can take a quick preliminary quiz to see if Trexo is right for your child.
We conduct an in-depth assessment of each child to ensure they are a good candidate for the Trexo Robotic Gait Trainer. Before talking to one of our experts, you can take a quick preliminary quiz to see if Trexo is right for your child.
[Take the Quiz Now](http://trexorobotics.com/<https:/www.trexorobotics.com/quiz-2/>)
## Our mission, vision, and values
Trexo Robotics was born out of a deeply personal experience. While studying engineering, our CEO Manmeet Maggu, learned of his nephew’s diagnosis with cerebral palsy. Searching for technologies to help his nephew stay healthy and active, he realized there were many limitations. Frustrated by this experience, he decided to change this and Trexo was born.
The Robotic Brace for children is just the beginning. At Trexo, we’re on a mission to create technologies that help people of all ages and ability levels so that collectively, we can all build healthier and happier communities.
[Learn more about us](http://trexorobotics.com/<https:/www.trexorobotics.com/about-us>)
## Our mission, vision, and values
Trexo Robotics was born out of a deeply personal experience. While studying engineering, our CEO Manmeet Maggu, learned of his nephew’s diagnosis with cerebral palsy. Searching for technologies to help his nephew stay healthy and active, he realized there were many limitations. Frustrated by this experience, he decided to change this and Trexo was born.
The Robotic Gait Trainer for children is just the beginning. At Trexo, we’re on a mission to create technologies that help people of all ages and ability levels so that ambulation is possible for all.
[Learn more about us](http://trexorobotics.com/<https:/www.trexorobotics.com/about-us>)

Read on how four year old Savvy gained more independence, strength, and is now able to weight bear fully while using the Trexo.

Parental feedback and success stories are not intended for US audiences. Currently Trexo is not available in the U.S.
## What parents have to say
“I’m so grateful for it, check everybody’s hips! Every child who’s not ambulatory should be given a chance to be in a Trexo and walk around!”
Alex's mom, Lauren
“Trexo is giving us hope because as a parent you are told all of these things your child will never do. Trexo has changed that.”
Luz's mom, Caro
“Friday is our 2 year anniversary! Trexo is working out great! Savvy loves it and we switched to the endurance mode and she is doing great on her own. We are so happy!”
Savvy's mom, Christina
See more Trexo Testimonials⟨8⟩
## Not sure if the Trexo will be right for your child?
We conduct an in-depth assessment of each child to ensure they are a good candidate for the Trexo Brace. Before talking to one of our experts, you can take a quick preliminary quiz to see if Trexo is right for your child.
We conduct an in-depth assessment of each child to ensure they are a good candidate for the Trexo Robotic Gait Trainer. Before talking to one of our experts, you can take a quick preliminary quiz to see if Trexo is right for your child.
Take the Quiz Now⟨7⟩
## Our mission, vision, and values
Trexo Robotics was born out of a deeply personal experience. While studying engineering, our CEO Manmeet Maggu, learned of his nephew’s diagnosis with cerebral palsy. Searching for technologies to help his nephew stay healthy and active, he realized there were many limitations. Frustrated by this experience, he decided to change this and Trexo was born.
The Robotic Brace for children is just the beginning. At Trexo, we’re on a mission to create technologies that help people of all ages and ability levels so that collectively, we can all build healthier and happier communities.
Learn more about us⟨38⟩
## Our mission, vision, and values
Trexo Robotics was born out of a deeply personal experience. While studying engineering, our CEO Manmeet Maggu, learned of his nephew’s diagnosis with cerebral palsy. Searching for technologies to help his nephew stay healthy and active, he realized there were many limitations. Frustrated by this experience, he decided to change this and Trexo was born.
The Robotic Gait Trainer for children is just the beginning. At Trexo, we’re on a mission to create technologies that help people of all ages and ability levels so that ambulation is possible for all.

generated_description:
### Trexo Robotics: Empowering Mobility One Step at a Time

**Company Overview**  
Founded in 2016 and based in Toronto, Canada, Trexo Robotics is on a mission to revolutionize mobility for individuals with disabilities, primarily focusing on children with cerebral palsy. The idea was sparked when CEO Manmeet Maggu discovered that his nephew would not be able to walk due to his condition. This personal experience ignited a passion to create technology that would enable children like him to take their first steps, using exoskeletons designed specifically for this purpose.

**Mission and Vision**  
Trexo envisions a future where wheelchairs are replaced by robotic exoskeletons that empower everyone—from children to adults and seniors—to walk. Their commitment is to enhance the quality of life for individuals with mobility challenges through innovation and engineering.

**Product Offerings**  
Trexo Robotics offers two main products:

1. **Trexo Home**: A robotic gait training device designed for use in the home. It allows children to improve their walking patterns and build strength and endurance, providing continuous support and accessories tailored to individual needs. 

2. **Trexo Plus**: Designed for clinical environments, this device allows physical therapists to assist patients with gait training, helping them regain mobility with the guidance of professionals.

Both offerings come with ongoing technical support, training for users, and a satisfaction guarantee.

**Current Status and Impact**  
Trexo Robotics has already made waves across the US and Canada with its innovative products. As of now, they have garnered substantial recognition in the realm of medical robotics and aim to reach more families looking for mobility solutions. They have a dedicated team of around 30 employees and are backed by the renowned startup accelerator Y Combinator, having joined Batch W19.

**Customer Experience**  
Trexo does not just stop at technology; they value the stories and feedback from the families using their products. Testimonials highlight incredible transformations where children, once unable to walk, have found new independence and opportunities for joy and play.

**Future Aspirations**  
Looking ahead, Trexo Robotics plans to expand their offerings and reach beyond current markets. They aim to provide more inclusive access to buoyant, active lifestyles for all, fostering healthier communities through ambulation.

For more information, you can visit their website at [Trexo Robotics](http://trexorobotics.com).

This is not just about robots; it's about redefining what's possible for children and individuals with mobility limitations. Trexo is building not just devices but dreams—one step at a time.
